tool_description: Quickly retrieve original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and Word Search from the Koran /Quran
title: Al-Quran

api_list.name: Get range of verses
api_list.description: Responds with a collection of *Ayahs/Verses* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{range}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the verses 1 to 5 from chapter 2 of the Quran?
I need the original Arabic text and translation for verses 10 to 15 in chapter 5.
Please give me the transliteration and translation for verses 20 to 25 from chapter 10.
Fetch the verses 30 to 35 from chapter 18 with their translations.
I would like to see the verses 40 to 45 from chapter 23 in Arabic and English.
Can you show me the verses 50 to 55 from chapter 36 with transliteration?
Retrieve the verses 60 to 65 from chapter 55 along with their translations.
I need the verses 70 to 75 from chapter 67 in both Arabic and English.
Please provide the verses 80 to 85 from chapter 78 with their transliteration.
Can you get me the verses 90 to 95 from chapter 112 in Arabic and translation?

api_list.name: Get base information
api_list.description: Responds with JSON including some properties of the Quran. *(deprecated)*
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: What is the original Arabic text of Surah Al-Fatiha?
Can you provide the translation of Surah Al-Baqarah in English?
I need the transliteration of Surah Al-Ikhlas.
Find the word 'mercy' in the Quran and show me the verses.
What is the translation of Surah Yasin in French?
Show me the original Arabic text and translation of Surah Al-Kahf.
Can you give me the transliteration and translation of Surah Al-Mulk?
Find the occurrences of the word 'peace' in the Quran.
What is the English translation of Surah Ar-Rahman?
Provide the original Arabic text and transliteration of Surah Al-Fil.

api_list.name: Get entire Surah/Chapter
api_list.description:
Possible values: ***1-114*** 
Responds with entire Surah/Chapter of the Koran including all verses in the Surah and some additional information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Represents a unique Surah/Chapter in the Koran.
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the full text of Surah Al-Fatiha?
I would like to read Surah Al-Baqarah. Can you get it for me?
Please show me the entire Surah An-Nisa.
Could you retrieve Surah Al-Ma'idah for me?
I want to see the full Surah Al-An'am.
Can you give me the complete Surah Al-A'raf?
Please provide the entire Surah Al-Anfal.
I would like to read the full Surah At-Tawbah.
Could you show me Surah Yunus?
Please retrieve the complete Surah Hud.

api_list.name: Get specific Ayah/Verse
api_list.description: Responds with a specific *Ayah/Verse* in a specific *Chapter/Surah* along with original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and verse ID in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/{chapterid}/{verseid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: chapterId
parameters.description:
Refers to a *Surah/Chapter* in the Koran
**Min Value: *1***
**Max Value: *114***

parameters.name: verseId
parameters.description: A valid *Ayah/verse* number from a specific chapter from the Quran

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the text and translation for verse 5 of chapter 2 in the Quran?
I need the Arabic text and translation for chapter 3, verse 10.
What does verse 255 of chapter 2 say in the Quran?
Please give me the transliteration and translation for chapter 4, verse 34.
I'd like to know the details of verse 1 from chapter 1.
Can you show me the original Arabic and translation for chapter 5, verse 48?
What is the translation of verse 7 in chapter 6?
I want to read the Arabic text and translation for chapter 7, verse 54.
Could you provide the details for verse 30 of chapter 10?
Please give me the translation and transliteration for chapter 9, verse 36.

api_list.name: Search for a word in Quran
api_list.description: Looks for a given keyword (English) in ***translation_eng*** key in the entire Koran and responds with all the verses containing the given keyword and toal matches in JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com/corpus/{searchterm}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "al-quran1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Any given keyword or phrase you like to search for in the Koran

utterances.utterance: Find all verses in the Quran that mention the word 'peace'.
Search for the keyword 'mercy' in the Quran.
Look up all occurrences of 'justice' in the Quran.
Retrieve verses containing the word 'faith' from the Quran.
Can you find all the verses with the word 'charity' in the Quran?
I want to see all mentions of 'patience' in the Quran.
Locate all verses that include the word 'forgiveness' in the Quran.
Find every verse with the word 'wisdom' in the Quran.
Search for the term 'compassion' in the Quran.
Look for all instances of 'truth' in the Quran.
